name: SNOMEDCTImplementationGuideforFHIR
title: SNOMED CT Implementation Guide for FHIR
description: Describes how to use SNOMED CT in FHIR

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance - Finding Focused
resource.description: Profile of Allergy Intolerance resource with bindings to SNOMED CT Clinical findings as well as additional constraints to avoid overlap with the binding.

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance - Substance Focused
resource.description: Profile of Allergy Intolerance resource with bindings to SNOMED CT Substances as well as additional constraints to avoid overlap with the binding.

resource.name: BMI
resource.description: Profile of HL7 BMI profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Blood pressure
resource.description: Profile of HL7 blood pressure profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Body Height
resource.description: Profile of HL7 body height profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Body Temperature
resource.description: Profile of HL7 body temperature profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Body Weight
resource.description: Profile of HL7 body weight profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Head Circumference
resource.description: Profile of HL7 head circumference profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Heart Rate
resource.description: Profile of HL7 heart rate profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Oxygen Saturation
resource.description: Profile of HL7 oxygen saturation profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: Respiratory Rate
resource.description: Profile of HL7 respiratory rate profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.

resource.name: SNOMED CT Specimen profile
resource.description: A profile of the Specimen resource for use with SNOMED CT coding.

resource.name: Allergy-Intolerance Finding Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for allergy or intolerance clinical findings. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 420134006 | Propensity to adverse reaction (finding) |

resource.name: BMI Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for BMI observable entities. It includes the single code from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) 60621009 | Body mass index (observable entity) |

resource.name: Body Height Observable entity Codes
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for body height observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint << 248334005 | Length of body (observable entity) |

resource.name: Core body temperature Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for core body temperature observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint << 276885007 | Core body temperature (observable entity) |

resource.name: Body weight Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for body weight observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 27113001 | Body weight (observable entity) | MINUS (<< 248350002 | Reference weight (observable entity) | OR << 301334000 | Birth weight centile (observable entity) |))

resource.name: Diastolic blood pressure Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for diastolic blood pressure observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 271650006 | Diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) | MINUS (<< 314465004 | 24 hour diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 716632005 | Baseline diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 315613000 | Target diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) |))

resource.name: Head circumference Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for head circumference observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 363812007 | Head circumference (observable entity) | MINUS << 248397001 | Head circumference centile (observable entity) |)

resource.name: Heart rate Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for heart rate observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 364075005 | Heart rate (observable entity) | MINUS 428420003 | Target heart rate (observable entity) |)

resource.name: Peripehral oxygen saturation Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for peripheral oxygen saturation observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint <<431314004 | Peripheral oxygen saturation (observable entity) |

resource.name: Respiratory rate Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for respiratory rate observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint << 86290005 | Respiratory rate (observable entity) |

resource.name: Systolic blood pressure Observable entity Code
resource.description: This value set contains concept codes for systolic blood pressure observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 271649006 | Systolic blood pressure (observable entity) | MINUS (<< 314464000 | 24 hour systolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 716579001 | Baseline systolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 315612005 | Target systolic blood pressure (observable entity) |))

resource.name: Specimen Collection Bodysite ValueSet Set
resource.description: Codes describing the specimen collcetion bodysite.

resource.name: Specimen Collection Method ValueSet
resource.description: Codes describing the specimen collection method.

resource.name: Specimen Processing Procedure ValueSet
resource.description: Codes describing the specimen processing procedure.

resource.name: Specimen Value Set
resource.description: Codes describing the type of specimen.
